It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 42 43 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 44 template<typename It> 45 void 46 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 47 copy_from_range(It first_it, It last_it) 48 { 49 while (first_it != last_it) 50 push(*(first_it++)); 51 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID_COND((*this),false) 52 } 53 54 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 55 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 56 binomial_heap_base() : m_p_max(0) 57 { 58 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID_COND((*this),false) 59 } 60 61 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 62 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 63 binomial_heap_base(const Cmp_Fn& r_cmp_fn) 64 : base_type(r_cmp_fn), m_p_max(0) 65 { PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID_COND((*this),false) } 66 67 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 68 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 69 binomial_heap_base(const PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC& other) 70 : base_type(other), m_p_max(0) 71 { PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID_COND((*this),false) } 72 73 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 74 void 75 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 76 swap(PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC& other) 77 { 78 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID_COND((*this),false) 79 base_type::swap(other); 80 std::swap(m_p_max, other.m_p_max); 81 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID_COND((*this),false) 82 } 83 84 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 85 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 86 ~binomial_heap_base() 87 { } 88 #endif
